CHAT.comment: Chi completes the letter writing task in a room full of noisy children. She doesn't seem distracted by them or by Mot asking them to leave every so often. She shares what she is going to write with Mot , and includes some of her suggestions , but seems very capable of writing the letter without any help. She asks EXP if Eric Carle will write back to her. When Mot asks her why she writes sincerely if she doesn't know what it means , Chi answers <because I like the way it sounds>.

u.a: MOT tells the other children in the room to leave .
the children still haven't left and are being quite noisy
EXP has given one of the kids something else to do
Chi is talking to herself as she writes ?
MOT tells kids to leave again
SIS asks if she can look at The Very Hngry Caterpillar . Mot asks her to leave .
Chi is talking to herself as she writes .
MOT tells the other children to leave again
cocoon is spelled incorrectly in Chi's letter
Chi had written <ca-> on one line and use on the next . she changed it to <be-> on one line and cause on the next
MOT is speaking to another child
